message: System stability is degraded following a necessary rollback. Users must rejoin the server to restore access to all data.

incident.impactSummary: Users must manually rejoin the server to regain access to previous session data. Temporary access disruption.
incident.rootCause: A recent fix or deployment introduced instability, necessitating an immediate rollback to the previous stable state.
incident.mitigation: Rollback to the stable version has been successfully deployed. Users instructed to reconnect.
incident.detection: Internal system monitoring and subsequent required mitigation (rollback).
actionItems: Communicate user action requirement (rejoining the server).
Monitor user connection and data synchronization rates.
Monitor status of external Roblox API
Investigate potential temporary data caching solutions
Track user reporting and ensure data access is fully restored upon user rejoin.
Monitor Roblox status page for resolution.
Quantify total impact on downstream internal services.
Confirm stability of the rolled-back environment.
Monitor user rejoin rate and confirm restoration of data access.

postmortemPlan.summary: Investigate the root cause of the fix failure/instability that required the rollback.
actionItems: Review changes introduced by the failed fix.
Improve validation testing prior to deployment.

timeline.event: System rollback pushed following unsuccessful fix attempt.
Confirmed root cause: External Roblox API down, preventing data access.
Rollback pushed and completed following a fix.
Report received that Roblox API dependency was unavailable.
